contacts.name: Cloudbreadth Sleeves Automated Customer Service
contacts.signature: Big sales are on! Leave positive comments for discounts!

121020000.text: Do you happen to know Mei? Are you her relative?

121020001.text: Greetings! Welcome to Cloudbreadth Sleeves. Have you seen an item of interest? I can give you more details about it~ I'm your online e-customer service representative, Intella!

121020002.text: Do you wish to transfer to a live customer support representative?

121020003.text: Please transfer me to a live customer support representative, thank you.

121020004.text: I'm afraid you might have the wrong person.

121020005.text: Sorry, I think I have the wrong person.
